name: DestroyTheGov.Org
description:
Here we have a corrupted government. You have started a movement, with protests continuing in front of the town hall. Scenarios will be shown to you and you decide how you want to take action. However this will change how things go in the game. Where you might start a riot and the government shuts your movement down!

What ever you decide it will change the cause of society!

We wish you the best to get this government in line!

This game was made for the Hardcore Punk Jam #3

We are looking at updating this game! So be sure to catch up on this little project!
